channel.title: CVE Feed for BMC Medical -- Luna CPAP Machine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BMC Medical -- Luna CPAP Machine

item.title: CVE-2017-12701|2024-09-17T02:27:16.151Z -- bmc%20medical -- luna%20cpap%20machine
item.description: BMC Medical Luna CPAP Machines released prior to July 1, 2017, contain an improper input validation vulnerability which may allow an authenticated attacker to crash the CPAP's Wi-Fi module resulting in a denial-of-service condition.
